mandatoryLogin_subtitle: Because you need to login first!
offerCodeModal_subtitle: Here is your code by {{brand}}. Enjoy your {{amount}} discount!
login_subtext2: Good to see you here again. We are happy that you are taking advantage of great student offers. If you don't have an account yet, don't worry, you can register right below!
register_eduMailInfo: If you have an e-mail with the .edu.tr extension, you do not need to verify that you are a student.
register_eduMailInfoDetails: You will need to upload your student certificate so that we can verify that you are a student when you register with your personal email, but when you register with your student email provided by your school, verifying your email is enough to activate your account.
register_passwordInfo: Your password must contain at least one letter and one number and must be at least 8 characters long.
register_checkbox_text: I read and agree with <terms>Terms & Conditions</terms> and <conditions>Privacy Policy</conditions>
forgotPassword_subtext: To reset your password, enter the e-mail address you registered on Ã–ÄŸrenci Baksana.
forgotPassword_mailSent: Password reset link has been successfully sent to your e-mail address.
inactiveStudent_title: To view the discount code, you must be a confirmed student!
inactiveStudent_subtext: Make sure you upload proof that you are a student.
deleteAccount_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
verifyAccount_formLabel_file: File That Verifies That You Are a Student
verifyAccount_form_file_details1: Since only official documents are processed during the verification phase, make sure that the document you will upload is:
verifyAccount_form_file_details1_bullet1: NOT a discounted public transport card,
verifyAccount_form_file_details1_bullet2: NOT a document that anyone can access, such as a syllabus, that does not prove that they are a student,
verifyAccount_form_file_details1_bullet3: NOT a screenshot of pages such as Student Information System or e-Okul where you can see your grades,
verifyAccount_form_file_details1_bullet4: Your name does not conflict with the information you provide when you register, such as your surname.
verifyAccount_form_file_details1_bullet5: Make sure it's not older than 6 months.
verifyAccount_form_file_details2: It will be enough to upload one document when verifying that you are a student. We told you what kind of document is not accepted, now let's explain what kind of document we will accept.:
verifyAccount_form_file_details2_bullet1: Photograph of the front of the student ID card issued by the school,
verifyAccount_form_file_details2_bullet2: Student certificate you get from student affairs, school principal or e-government,
verifyAccount_form_file_details2_bullet3: Or the transcript where we can see the name, surname, registration year and school.
verifyAccount_form_file_details3: Once you upload only one of the above documents, our verification team will be able to verify your account without any problems.
verifyAccount_form_file_details4: As student verification will be valid for a limited time, we may periodically ask you to reconfirm that you are a student.
